loginStep0Explanation: ngokufaka i-imeyili yakho kuqala khona lapho kulelo bhokisi elincane!
loginStep1Explanation: Manje faka iphasiwedi yakho ukuze uqhubeke nokuxoxa ku-uChat.
emailNotFound: Asikwazanga ukuthola i-akhawunti ngale imeyili, zama futhi!
step3Subtitle: Izinhlamvu ezincane eziyi-8, usonhlamvukazi ongu-1, inombolo engu-1
signupStep0Explanation: Siyakwamukela! Ake siqale ngokufaka ikheli lakho le-imeyili NOMA ungabhalisa ne-Google ukuze uthole ukufinyelela okusheshayo.
signupStep1Explanation: Khetha ukuthi ufuna ukwaziwa kanjani ku-uChat. Leli igama lakho eliboniswayo elizobonwa abanye. Kufana nesidlaliso!
signupStep2Explanation: Isibambo sakho sifana nesihlonzi sakho - sihluke ngokuphelele kuwe futhi sisiza abanye ukuthi bakuthole. Akekho ongakopisha isibambo sakho!
signupStep3Explanation: Dala iphasiwedi eqinile ukuze ugcine i-akhawunti yakho ivikelekile, sicela uyenze ivikeleke njengokungathi sina! ðŸ¥º
signupStep4Explanation: Cishe usufikile! Qinisekisa iphasiwedi yakho futhi uvumelane nemibandela yethu ukuze uqedele ukudala i-akhawunti yakho.
usernameTooShort: Igama lomsebenzisi kufanele okungenani libe nezinhlamvu ezi-3
usernameTooLong: Igama lomsebenzisi alikwazi ukweqa izinhlamvu ezingu-30
handleTooShort: Isibambo kufanele sibe nezinhlamvu okungenani ezi-3
handleInvalid: Isibambo singaqukatha kuphela izinhlamvu, izinombolo, nama-underscore
passwordTooShort: Iphasiwedi kumele okungenani ibe nezinhlamvu eziyi-8
passwordNoUppercase: Iphasiwedi kumele okungenani ibe nofeleba olulodwa olulodwa
passwordNoNumber: Iphasiwedi kumele okungenani ibe nenombolo eyodwa
emailTaken: Le imeyili isivele ithathiwe. Zama futhi!
handleTaken: Lesi sibambo sesivele sithathiwe. Zama futhi!
